Business description: Meggitt PLC

Meggitt Ltd formerly known as Meggitt PLC is a United Kingdom-based company. The Company manufactures components and subsystems for the aerospace, defense and energy markets. The Group manages its activities within four divisions aligned with its customers, airframe systems, Engine systems, Energy & equipment services & support. Its airframe system provide braking systems, fire protection and security systems, power and motion, fuel systems, avionics and sensorsand polymer gaskets. Its engine systems provide a range of sensor technologies and applications, including vibration monitoring and engine health management systems. It also provides aircraft engine heat exchangers, flow control and advanced engine composites.

Number of employees: 9,270
